about_the_game:
Complete soundtrack from Nighthaw-X3000 contains 9 rad synthwave/retro-electro songs that will blow your mind away.
Turn up the bass and have a nice tip to the 80s!

Track list - all songs are in MP3 320kb/s format:
  • 01. Miura Vinyl (Do Nothing Club)
  • 02. X3000 Stage Theme (VHS Dreams)
  • 03. Superamerica (Do Nothing Club)
  • 04. Somewhere We Can Go (Timecop1983)
  • 05. Journeys (Timecop1983)
  • 06. Turbulence (Neon Nox)
  • 07. Roadrage (Neon Nox)
  • 08. Discorecord (VHS Dreams)
  • 09. R.E.D.M (VHS Dreams)

A big thank you for all the artists: Do Nothing Club, VHS Dreams, Timecop1983 and Neon Nox. Be sure to check them out!
detailed_description:
Complete soundtrack from Nighthaw-X3000 contains 9 rad synthwave/retro-electro songs that will blow your mind away.
Turn up the bass and have a nice tip to the 80s!

Track list - all songs are in MP3 320kb/s format:
  • 01. Miura Vinyl (Do Nothing Club)
  • 02. X3000 Stage Theme (VHS Dreams)
  • 03. Superamerica (Do Nothing Club)
  • 04. Somewhere We Can Go (Timecop1983)
  • 05. Journeys (Timecop1983)
  • 06. Turbulence (Neon Nox)
  • 07. Roadrage (Neon Nox)
  • 08. Discorecord (VHS Dreams)

A big thank you for all the artists: Do Nothing Club, VHS Dreams, Timecop1983 and Neon Nox. Be sure to check them out!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9-Compatible with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Official soundtrack from Nighthaw-X3000 video game.
